name: Stream Machine
description:
This was my first game jam, and my first game! Hope you like it :)

A procedurally generated game for the 8 bits to infinity game jam where you are in control of the Stream Machine. With this nifty device, you can stream an alternate dimension and make some quick money! But hurry, the first connection is free for a LIMITED TIME ONLY. After your first pass through, you will need to deposit a small gold fee to help with the upkeep of our servers. Traveling through dimensions isn't cheap, ya know?

Solo developer using the Unity Engine. 

White/Blue Chests = Extra Time

Links to assets:

  • https://gvituri.itch.io/isometric-trpg = Terrain and Characters
  • https://wenrexa.itch.io/ui-different01 = UI
  • https://admurin.itch.io/free-chest-animations = Chests
  • https://ninjikin.itch.io/treasure = Treasure
  • https://arcade.itch.io/c64 = Text
  • https://jasontomlee.itch.io/blood-fx = Blood
  • https://xyezawr.itch.io/free-pixel-effects-pack-14-mini-magick-shoots-4 = Spawn FX
  • music from dl-sounds.com
  • sfx: https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/packs/16681/

 Almost all assets used were free on itch.io. Thank you so much to all the artists providing assets for the community. When I am in a better place, you guys are definitely on my list to revisit with some donations :)

Notes: Notes: 27 unique treasures with 3 tier looting system (with a bonus time chest to keep your stream connection going), 16 unique enemies, procedural generation,  loot, clicker, boss fights, time buff
